item.title: A Quicksilver Chanukah, Day 5: Golem
item.description: What is golem? golem is a mostly-safe graphics API that targets OpenGL 3.2 and WebGL 1 that helps make writing GL less painful Why golem and not X If you’re just interested in what golem is and how it works, feel free to skip this section! The previous three days I’ve introduced new crates that mostly stood on their own. I’m not aware of any fleshed-out alternatives, so creating those libraries myself doesn’t require much explanation.
